definition[0]: to be more than a particular number or amount
example[0]: Working hours must not exceed 42 hours a week.
definition[1]: to go beyond what rules or laws say you are allowed to do
example[2]: He was fined for exceeding the speed limit.
example[3]: The riot police had exceeded their authority.
definition[2]: to go beyond an official or legal limit
example[5]: Pesticide levels must not exceed the limit set by the EU.
